Frog Party Page

Welcome to the frog party page!

This is simply a test for a student of creating webpages. You might encounter some errors or *gasp* bugs. Before you leave, please fill out a quick survey form and enjoy your stay~

Ps: The frog images are clickable and open in a new page!

Ps2: The button with the ? on the bottom right of the page leads you tu the documentation of codepen. Be sure to click it if you need help!

See ya!
